scripts.force:cli: wget https://developer.salesforce.com/media/salesforce-cli/sfdx/channels/stable/sfdx-linux-x64.tar.xz && mkdir ~/sfdx && tar xJf sfdx-linux-x64.tar.xz -C ~/sfdx --strip-components 1 && echo "$HOME/sfdx/bin" >> $GITHUB_PATH && ~/sfdx/bin/sfdx version
scripts.sfdx:delta: echo y | sfdx plugins:install sfdx-git-delta && sfdx plugins
scripts.createdelta: mkdir changed-sources && sfdx sgd:source:delta --to "HEAD" --from "HEAD^" --output changed-sources/ --generate-delta --source force-app/
scripts.scaner:run: cd changed-sources && sfdx scanner:run --format sarif --target './**/*.cls' --category "Design,Best Practices,Performance" --outfile 'apexScanResults.sarif' && cat apexScanResults.sarif && cd ..
